scripts.build: postcss assets/css/src/*.css --dir assets/css/dist --use postcss-import --use tailwindcss --use autoprefixer --no-map --verbose
scripts.watch: postcss assets/css/src/*.css --dir assets/css/dist --use postcss-import --use tailwindcss --use autoprefixer --no-map --verbose --watch
scripts.bundle: npm run build && dir-archiver --src ./ --dest ./groundbreaker.zip --exclude groundbreaker.zip node_modules .git .DS_Store .idea
